dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1436 IH: To provide additional funding for scholarships for students at 1890 institutions.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. David Scott of Georgia (for himself, Ms. Adams, Ms. Sewell, Ms. Crockett, Ms. Brown, Mr. Jackson of Illinois, Mrs. Hayes, and Mr. McGovern) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To provide additional funding for scholarships for students at 1890 institutions.

section.header: Additional funding for scholarships for students at 1890 institutions

subsection.text: Section 1446(b) of the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3222a(b)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (2) and (3) as paragraphs (3) and (4), respectively;
by inserting after paragraph (1) the following:

Of the funds of the Commodity Credit Corporation, the Secretary shall make available to carry out this section $10,000,000 for fiscal year 2025 and each fiscal year thereafter, to remain available until expended.
in paragraph (3) (as so redesignated), by striking each of fiscal years 2020 through 2023 and inserting fiscal year 2020 and each fiscal year thereafter.

subsection.text: Section 1446 of the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3222a) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(3), by striking subsection (b)(1) and inserting paragraphs (1) and (2) of subsection (b); and
in paragraph (4) of subsection (b) (as redesignated by subsection (a)(1)), by striking paragraphs (1) and (2) and inserting paragraphs (1), (2), and (3).
